abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column offers reminder that LeBron James is largely responsible for Cleveland Cavaliers lineup currently embarrassing itself in NBA finals; suggests team's dismal performance is cautionary tale of giving player executive leverage.
lead_paragraph: This was the team the King himself courted. It is down, two games to none and, thus far, embarrassing itself.

headline.print_headline: Leader of Finals Team, and Engineer of Its Collapse
headline.main: The Cavs That LeBron James Assembled Are Getting Clobbered

snippet: This was the team the King himself courted. It is down, two games to none and, thus far, embarrassing itself....
